attributes.action: Add a Vote of No Confidence Box to Future Ballot papers.
attributes.background: A No Confidence Box on future ballot papers will give the public a stronger voice we wont have to settle for a "it'll have to do party" thats only slightly better it will force policy change so we can vote will full confidence as confidence is at an all time low. It will also stop coalition ties.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, we're not sure what you'd want to happen if the largest number of votes from a specific constituency were for "no confidence". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
